posts.post_content:
Putting together a run of catchers in the P2 set.

Looking for clean, EX or better P2 Pins of the following catchers:

Jimmy Archer
Bill Bergen
Red Dooin
Tex Erwin
Paddy Livingston
John McLean
Pat Moran
Tom Needham
Eddie Phelps
Boss Schmidt
Oscar Stanage

Interested only in Small Letter examples without rust or scratches.

I do have a pair of Large Letter P2 Pins available for trade:

George Gibson
Ira Thomas

Feel free to send me scans of the P2 Pins of any of the listed P2 Pins listed above as well as your price.

Thanks,

Patrick
